options.query:
{{`UPDATE
    promo_codes
SET
    discount_type = '${components.149e73bf-4ad5-42d5-b034-7811eb4df5c0.value}',
    amount = ${components.14344e97-0687-479e-9a55-596cf61dda2b.value},
    minimum_spend = ${components.7331c813-ed49-4eba-9cce-1c5b1ed9e755.value ? components.14ec677a-f8ca-41e8-af99-a623396ed218.value : 'NULL' },
    maximum_spend = ${components.e7785fd3-ce06-44af-9d6f-fe42d07c38c9.value ? components.3ae01e5b-bb00-442c-a5e5-bee34b03c14e.value : 'NULL' },
    free_shipping = ${components.38bbc303-30ca-40c0-a03c-fc671123ea19.value},
    valid_till = '${moment(components.1cc9a2c5-957b-46a8-a3b3-212997ce1c37.value, "DD/MM/YYYY").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}',
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE
    id = ${components.af35eba4-ad7c-47c6-8a14-04c431ecec76.selectedRow.id};`}}

SELECT
    *
FROM
    promo_codes
ORDER BY
    id DESC;

INSERT INTO promo_codes (
    promo_code, 
    discount_type, 
    amount, 
    minimum_spend, 
    maximum_spend, 
    free_shipping, 
    created_at, 
    valid_till, 
    updated_at
)
VALUES (
    '{{components.b8a25821-02cb-4a85-8c4f-6b61c08a1056.value}}', 
    '{{components.93c58cf9-b3c0-4398-982c-58f0dc8bbb18.value}}', 
    {{components.375a99f4-d938-4625-b1fe-71d069c310cf.value}}, 
    {{components.a42fe37b-70d3-480a-9be2-9cb4317e8c47.value ? components.9df92a6e-fc6d-430e-bcc8-a475c813497f.value : 'NULL'}}, 
    {{components.a0f9ea16-82e4-4a2c-8cdc-4588430ea556.value ? components.cf0c1cad-5b99-4ef2-955a-75a7472789e8.value : 'NULL'}}, 
    {{components.ccc9510d-4df0-4ab7-b58c-f715babcec13.value}}, 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    '{{moment(components.26310e5d-be67-453e-957c-83aff66132a1.value, "DD/MM/YYYY").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}', 
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE promo_codes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    amount REAL,
    minimum_spend REAL,
    maximum_spend REAL,
    free_shipping BOOLEAN,
    valid_till DATE,
    promo_code VARCHAR(50),
    discount_type VARCHAR(50),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
